Award.AwardTitle: SGER: Radio Spectrum and Direction Finding Measurements at Auroral Latitudes
Award.AbstractNarration: This project will develop a new digital receiver for medium frequency (MF) radio emissions that are present in the Earth's auroral zones. A study of the feasibility of moving the MF Interferometer from Sondrestrom, Greenland to a site an auroral site in Alaska where complementary data from optical images would be available. In addition to the instrument development and planning, the project will investigate the theoretical aspects of auroral MF radio emissions. These studies will make use of data being collected at several auroral sites in Canada, Greenland, and Alaska.
